CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page 21, reads: "3. Winner of the grand prize, Mrs. Lillie Harris, is presented with the Bendix Economat Washer by Saul B. Pearlstein"
TitMainTitle: Crowd of men and women standing around Lillie Harris, winner of a Bendix Economat Washer, with Saul B. Pearlstein standing on right, gathered in Syria Mosque for the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
